data.name: PivotGridControlActiveFilterInfo
data.value: For internal use. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridCommandsSortDescending
data.value: In OLAP mode, sorts values of the specified field in descending order.

data.name: PivotGridCommandsSortAscending
data.value: In OLAP mode, sorts values of the specified field in ascending order.

data.name: PivotGridCommandsShowUnboundExpressionEditor
data.value: Shows the Expression Editor.

data.name: PivotGridCommandsShowPrintPreviewDialog
data.value: Creates the print document from the PivotGridControl and displays the modal Print Preview of the document.

data.name: PivotGridCommandsShowPrintPreview
data.value: Creates the print document from the PivotGridControl and displays the Print Preview of the document.

data.name: PivotGridCommandsShowPrefilter
data.value: Shows the Prefilter.

data.name: PivotGridCommandsShowFieldList
data.value: Shows the Customization Form.

data.name: PivotGridCommandsResetPrefilter
data.value: Resets the Prefilter's settings to their default values.

data.name: PivotGridCommandsReloadData
data.value: Reloads data from the control's data source and recalculates summaries.

data.name: PivotGridCommandsHidePrefilter
data.value: Hides the Prefilter.

data.name: PivotGridCommandsHideFieldList
data.value: Hides the Customization Form.

data.name: PivotGridCommandsHideField
data.value: Hides the specified field.

data.name: PivotGridCommandsExpandField
data.value: Expands all the rows/columns which correspond to the specified column field or row field.

data.name: PivotGridCommandsCollapseField
data.value: Collapses all the rows/columns which correspond to the specified column field or row field.

data.name: PivotGridCommandsClearSorting
data.value: Disables sorting in OLAP mode.

data.name: PivotGridCommandsChangeFieldValueExpanded
data.value: Toggles the specified field value's expanded state.

data.name: PivotGridCommandsChangeFieldSortOrder
data.value: Toggles the specified field's sort order.

data.name: PivotDrillDownDataSourceRowCount
data.value: Gets the number of records in the data source.

data.name: PivotDrillDownDataSourceItem
data.value: Provides indexed access to the rows in the current data source.

data.name: PivotDrillDownDataSourceIsLive
data.value: Gets or sets whether to update the data source when the pivot grid data changes.

data.name: PivotDrillDownDataRowListSourceRowIndex
data.value: Gets the row's index in the pivot grid's data source.

data.name: PivotDrillDownDataRowItem
data.value: Gets the row's value for the specified field.

data.name: PivotDrillDownDataRowIndex
data.value: Gets the row's index within PivotDrillDownDataRow.DataSource.

data.name: PivotDrillDownDataRowDataSource
data.value: Gets the data source which contains the current row.

data.name: GroupFilterValuesFilterType
data.value: Gets or sets the filter type.

data.name: FieldValueCellValueType
data.value: Gets the type of the cell.

data.name: FieldValueCellParent
data.value: Gets the parent of the current cell.

data.name: FieldValueCellField
data.value: Gets the field whose value the cell represents.

data.name: FieldValueCellDataField
data.value: Gets the data field which identifies the cell.

data.name: FieldFilterValuesFilterType
data.value: Gets or sets the field's filter type.

data.name: FieldFilterValuesField
data.value: Gets the field which owns the current collection.

data.name: PivotGridControlAllowExpandOnDoubleClick
data.value: Gets or sets whether field values are expanded/collapsed on a double click. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlAllowExpand
data.value: Gets or sets whether expand buttons are displayed. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlAllowDragInCustomizationForm
data.value: Gets or sets whether end-users are allowed to drag field headers between areas in the Customization Form.

data.name: PivotGridControlAllowDrag
data.value: Gets or sets whether an end-user is allowed to drag the field headers. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlAllowCustomizationForm
data.value: Gets or sets whether end-users are allowed to invoke the Customization Form.

data.name: PivotGridControlAllowCrossGroupVariation
data.value: Gets or sets whether summary variations and running totals are calculated independently within individual groups, or throughout the Pivot Grid. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlAllowFilter
data.value: Gets or sets whether filter buttons are displayed within field headers. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlAllowFilterInFieldList
data.value: Gets or sets whether filtering can be applied to fields via the Customization Form. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlAllowHideFields
data.value: Gets or sets a value that specifies when fields can be hidden by end-users.

data.name: PivotGridControlAllowMRUFilterList
data.value: Gets or sets whether end-users are allowed to invoke the MRU Filter List. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlAllowPrefilter
data.value: Gets or sets whether end-users are allowed to invoke the Prefilter.

data.name: PivotGridControlAllowResizing
data.value: Gets or sets whether end-users are allowed to resize the PivotGridControl's elements. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlAllowSort
data.value: Gets or sets whether end-users can change the sort order of fields. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlAllowSortBySummary
data.value: Gets or sets whether end-users can sort the row/column field values by other column/row summary values. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlAllowSortInFieldList
data.value: Gets or sets whether the sort order of field values can be toggled via the Customization Form. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlAutoExpandGroups
data.value: Gets or sets whether field values are expanded or collapsed by default. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlBestFitArea
data.value: Gets or sets which interface elements are taken into account when calculating optimal width for columns.

data.name: PivotGridControlBestFitMaxRowCount
data.value: Gets or sets the number of rows taken into account when calculating the optimal width required for columns (or rows) to completely display their contents.

data.name: PivotGridControlBestFitMode
data.value: Gets or sets how the optimal width required for a column (or row) to completely display its contents is calculated.

data.name: PivotGridControlCanEnablePrefilter
data.value: For internal use.

data.name: PivotGridControlCellBackground
data.value: Gets or sets the brush used to paint the background of data cells. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlCellForeground
data.value: Gets or sets the brush used to paint the foreground of data cells. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlCellMenuCustomizations
data.value: Allows you to customize the context menu, invoked when right-clicking cells, by adding new menu items or removing existing items.

data.name: PivotGridControlCellSelectedBackground
data.value: Gets or sets the brush used to paint the background of the selected data cell. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlCellSelectedForeground
data.value: Gets or sets the brush used to paint the foreground of the selected data cell. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlCellTotalBackground
data.value: Gets or sets the brush used to paint the background of total and grand total cells. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlCellTotalForeground
data.value: Gets or sets the brush used to paint the foreground of total and grand total cells. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlCellTotalSelectedBackground
data.value: Gets or sets the brush used to paint the background of the selected total or grand total cell. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlCellTotalSelectedForeground
data.value: Gets or sets the brush used to paint the foreground of the selected total or grand total cell. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlChartAutoTranspose
data.value: Gets or sets whether a bound chart control should be transposed if the number of series exceeds the number of argument values. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlChartDataProvideMode
data.value: Gets or sets what data the pivot grid should pass to a bound chart control. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlChartDataProvidePriority
data.value: Gets or sets whether the pivot grid should pass columns or rows to a bound chart control when it is impossible to find the lowest-level data. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlChartDataSource
data.value: Gets a data source for a chart control.

data.name: PivotGridControlChartFieldValuesProvideMode
data.value: Gets or sets how field values are passed to the chart control.This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlChartMaxPointCountInSeries
data.value: Gets or sets the maximum allowed number of points in a series. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlChartMaxSeriesCount
data.value: Gets or sets the maximum allowed number of series in the chart data source.This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlChartProvideCellValuesAsType
data.value: Gets or sets the type to which cell values are converted before they are exported to the Chart Control. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlChartProvideColumnCustomTotals
data.value: Gets or sets whether column custom totals should be passed to a chart control. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlChartProvideColumnFieldValuesAsType
data.value: Gets or sets the type to which the column field values are converted before they are exported to the chart control. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlChartProvideColumnGrandTotals
data.value: Gets or sets whether column grand totals are passed to a chart control. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlChartProvideColumnTotals
data.value: Gets or sets whether column totals are passed to a chart control. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlChartProvideDataByColumns
data.value: Gets or sets whether series in a chart control are created based on PivotGrid columns or rows. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlChartProvideEmptyCells
data.value: Gets or sets whether empty cells should be processed by the Chart control. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlChartProvideRowCustomTotals
data.value: Gets or sets whether row custom totals should be displayed in a chart control. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlChartProvideRowFieldValuesAsType
data.value: Gets or sets the type to which the row field values are converted before they are exported to the chart control.This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlChartProvideRowGrandTotals
data.value: Gets or sets whether row grand totals are passed to a chart control.This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlChartProvideRowTotals
data.value: Gets or sets whether row totals are passed to a chart control. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlChartSelectionOnly
data.value: Gets or sets whether a chart control should visualize data from the selected cells only.

data.name: PivotGridControlChartUpdateDelay
data.value: Gets or sets the delay between changing the cell focus or selection, and updating the bound Chart control.This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlClipboardCopyCollapsedValuesMode
data.value: Gets or sets how to copy collapsed field values to the clipboard. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlClipboardCopyMultiSelectionMode
data.value: Gets or sets how to copy cells to the clipboard when multiple cells are selected. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlColumnCount
data.value: Gets the number of columns in the PivotGridControl.

data.name: PivotGridControlColumnFieldValuesAlignment
data.value: Gets or sets the vertical alignment of column field values. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlColumnTotalsLocation
data.value: Gets or sets the location of column totals.

data.name: PivotGridControlCopyToClipboardWithFieldValues
data.value: Gets or sets whether field values are copied to the clipboard when CTRL+C is pressed or the CopySelectionToClipboard method is called.

data.name: PivotGridControlDataFieldArea
data.value: Gets or sets the area in which the data field headers are displayed.

data.name: PivotGridControlDataFieldAreaIndex
data.value: Gets or sets the position of the data field headers.

data.name: PivotGridControlDataFieldCaption
data.value: Gets or sets the text displayed within the data header.

data.name: PivotGridControlDataFieldHeight
data.value: Gets or sets the height of a data field value. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlDataFieldUnboundExpressionMode
data.value: Gets or sets whether unbound expressions for data fields are calculated based on the data source records, or summary values.This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlDataFieldWidth
data.value: Gets or sets the width of a data field value. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlDataSource
data.value: Gets or sets the PivotGridControl data source.

data.name: PivotGridControlDeferredUpdates
data.value: Gets or sets whether dragging fields within the Customization Form (when it's painted using the Excel2007 style) immediately updates the layout of fields in the PivotGrid control. This option controls the state of the 'Defer Layout Update' check box in the Customization Form, when the PivotGridControl.FieldListStyle option is set to Excel2007.

data.name: PivotGridControlDrawFocusedCellRect
data.value: Gets or sets whether a focus rectangle is painted around the currently focused cell.

data.name: PivotGridControlDrillDownMaxRowCount
data.value: Gets or sets the maximum number of rows returned when calling the CreateDrillDownDataSource method.

data.name: PivotGridControlExcelFieldListTemplate
data.value: Gets or sets the template used to display the Customization Form in the Excel style.

data.name: PivotGridControlExpressionEditorContainer
data.value: This member supports the internal infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

data.name: PivotGridControlFieldCellKpiTemplate
data.value: Gets or sets a template used to display data cells that contain KPI graphics. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlFieldCellKpiTemplateSelector
data.value: Gets or sets an object that chooses a template for cells that contain KPI graphics. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlFieldCellTemplate
data.value: Gets or sets a template used to display data cells. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlFieldCellTemplateSelector
data.value: Gets or sets an object that chooses a cell template based on custom logic. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlFieldHeaderContentStyle
data.value: Gets or sets a style applied to the field headers. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlFieldHeaderDragIndicatorTemplate
data.value: Gets or sets a template used to display the drag indicator.

data.name: PivotGridControlFieldHeaderListTemplate
data.value: Gets or sets a template used to display field headers in the Customization Form when they are arranged in a list. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlFieldHeaderListTemplateSelector
data.value: Gets or sets an object that chooses a template, used to display field headers in the Customization Form when they are arranged in a list. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlFieldHeaderTemplate
data.value: Gets or sets a template used to display field headers. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlFieldHeaderTemplateSelector
data.value: Gets or sets an object that chooses a field header template based on custom logic. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlFieldHeaderTreeViewTemplate
data.value: Gets or sets a template used to display field headers in the Customization Form when they are arranged in a tree. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlFieldHeaderTreeViewTemplateSelector
data.value: Gets or sets an object that chooses a template, used to display field headers in the Customization Form when they are arranged in a tree. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlFieldHeight
data.value: Gets or sets the row height for the current pivot grid.

data.name: PivotGridControlFieldListAllowedLayouts
data.value: Gets or sets which layouts can be applied to the Customization Form when it is painted in Excel2007 style.This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlFieldListIncludeVisibleFields
data.value: Gets or sets whether to show visible fields in the Customization Form.This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlFieldListLayout
data.value: Gets or sets the customization form's layout when it is painted in Excel2007 style. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlFieldListSplitterX
data.value: Gets or sets the position of the vertical splitter displayed in the Customization Form. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlFieldListSplitterY
data.value: Gets or sets the position of the horizontal splitter displayed in the Customization Form. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlFieldListStyle
data.value: Gets or sets a style that defines the visual appearance of the Customization Form. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlFieldListTemplate
data.value: Gets or sets the template used to display the Customization Form.

data.name: PivotGridControlFields
data.value: Provides access to a pivot grid's field collection.

data.name: PivotGridControlFieldValueMenuCustomizations
data.value: Allows you to customize the context menu, invoked when right-clicking the field values, by adding new menu items or removing existing items.

data.name: PivotGridControlFieldValueTemplate
data.value: Gets or sets a template used to display field values. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlFieldValueTemplateSelector
data.value: Gets or sets an object that chooses a field value template based on custom logic. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlFieldWidth
data.value: Gets or sets the column width for the current pivot grid.

data.name: PivotGridControlFilterByVisibleFieldsOnly
data.value: Gets or sets whether to take into account filter conditions of visible filter fields only.

data.name: PivotGridControlFixedRowHeaders
data.value: Gets or sets whether to anchor row headers to the control edge when scrolling the pivot grid horizontally. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlFocusedCell
data.value: Gets or sets the coordinates of the focused cell.

data.name: PivotGridControlFocusedCellBorderTemplate
data.value: Gets or sets a template used to display border of the focused cell.

data.name: PivotGridControlGridMenu
data.value: Gets the context menu currently being displayed within the PivotGridControl.

data.name: PivotGridControlGroupDataCaseSensitive
data.value: Gets or sets whether data is grouped case-sensitively.

data.name: PivotGridControlGroupFieldsInFieldList
data.value: Gets or sets whether hidden fields are grouped within the Customization Form. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlGroupFilterMode
data.value: Gets or sets the filtering mode of grouped fields.

data.name: PivotGridControlGroups
data.value: Gets the collection of field groups.

data.name: PivotGridControlHeaderAreaMenuCustomizations
data.value: Allows you to customize the context menu, invoked when right-clicking the header area, by adding new menu items or removing existing items.

data.name: PivotGridControlHeaderMenuCustomizations
data.value: Allows you to customize the context menu, invoked when right-clicking the field headers, by adding new menu items or removing existing items.

data.name: PivotGridControlHiddenFields
data.value: Gets the collection of hidden fields.

data.name: PivotGridControlIsCellMenuEnabled
data.value: Gets or sets whether a context menu is invoked when an end-user right-clicks a cell. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlIsFieldListMenuEnabled
data.value: Gets or sets whether the Customization Form Layout menu is available for end-users.

data.name: PivotGridControlIsFieldListVisible
data.value: Gets or sets whether the Customization Form is visible. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlIsFieldValueMenuEnabled
data.value: Gets or sets whether the field value context menu is shown when an end-user right-clicks a field value. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlIsFilterPopupMenuEnabled
data.value: Gets or sets whether right-clicking a filter drop-down window invokes a context menu that allows you to invert the current check states of items. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlIsFilterPopupWaitIndicatorVisible
data.value: For internal use.

data.name: PivotGridControlIsHeaderAreaMenuEnabled
data.value: Gets or sets whether the header area context menu is shown when an end-user right-clicks a header area. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlIsHeaderMenuEnabled
data.value: Gets or sets whether the field header context menu is shown when an end-user right-clicks a field's header. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlIsMainWaitIndicatorVisible
data.value: For internal use.

data.name: PivotGridControlIsPrefilterEnabled
data.value: Gets or sets whether the filter specified by the Prefilter, is enabled. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlIsPrefilterVisible
data.value: Gets whether the Prefilter is invoked. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlLeftTopCoord
data.value: Gets the column and row indexes of the data cell displayed in the top left corner.

data.name: PivotGridControlLeftTopPixelCoord
data.value: Gets the coordinates of the data area displayed in the top left corner.

data.name: PivotGridControlLoadingPanelDelay
data.value: Gets or sets the delay before displaying the loading panel in asynchronous mode. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlMergeColumnFieldValues
data.value: Gets or sets whether to merge the neighboring column headers if they contain the same field value. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlMergeRowFieldValues
data.value: Gets or sets whether to merge the neighboring row headers if they contain the same field value. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlMRUFilterListCount
data.value: Gets or sets the number of filter criteria stored into the MRU Filter List. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlMRUFilters
data.value: Gets the MRU Filter List.

data.name: PivotGridControlMultiSelection
data.value: Gets the selected cells.

data.name: PivotGridControlOlapConnectionString
data.value: Gets or sets a connection string to a cube in an MS Analysis Services database.

data.name: PivotGridControlOlapDataProvider
data.value: Gets or sets which data provider should be used to bind to an OLAP cube. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlOlapDefaultMemberFields
data.value: Gets or sets for which filter fields the pivot grid processes only data related to their <a href=\"http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ms175626.aspx\">default members. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlPrefilterContainer
data.value: This member supports the internal infrastructure and is not intended be used directly from your code.

data.name: PivotGridControlPrefilterControl
data.value: Gets the Prefilter.

data.name: PivotGridControlPrefilterCriteria
data.value: Gets or sets the pivot grid's prefilter criteria. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlPrefilterPanelText
data.value: Gets the filter expression displayed within the prefilter panel. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlPrefilterString
data.value: Gets or sets the filter expression specified by the Prefilter.

data.name: PivotGridControlPrintCellBackground
data.value: Gets or sets the brush used to paint the background of data cells when the pivot grid is printed. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlPrintCellForeground
data.value: Gets or sets the brush used to paint the foreground of data cells when the pivot grid is printed. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlPrintCellTotalBackground
data.value: Gets or sets the brush used to paint the background of total and grand total cells when the pivot grid is printed. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlPrintCellTotalForeground
data.value: Gets or sets the brush used to paint the foreground of total and grand total cells when the pivot grid is printed. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlPrintColumnHeaders
data.value: Gets or sets whether to print headers of the column fields. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlPrintDataHeaders
data.value: Gets or sets whether to print headers of the data fields. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlPrintFieldCellKpiTemplate
data.value: Gets or sets a template used to print data cells that contain KPI graphics. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlPrintFieldCellKpiTemplateSelector
data.value: Gets or sets a template selector that chooses a print template for data cells that contain KPI graphics. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlPrintFieldCellTemplate
data.value: Gets or sets a template used to print data cells. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlPrintFieldCellTemplateSelector
data.value: Gets or sets a template selector that chooses a print template for data cells based on custom logic. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlPrintFieldHeaderTemplate
data.value: Gets or sets a template used to print field headers. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlPrintFieldHeaderTemplateSelector
data.value: Gets or sets a template selector that chooses a print template for field headers based on custom logic. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlPrintFieldValueTemplate
data.value: Gets or sets a template used to print field values. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlPrintFieldValueTemplateSelector
data.value: Gets or sets a template selector that chooses a print template for field values based on custom logic. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlPrintFilterHeaders
data.value: Gets or sets whether to print headers of the filter fields. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlPrintHeadersOnEveryPage
data.value: Gets or sets whether to print field headers on every page. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlPrintHorzLines
data.value: Gets or sets whether the horizontal grid lines are printed.This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlPrintInsertPageBreaks
data.value: Gets or sets whether to insert page breaks at the end of every page. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlPrintLayoutMode
data.value: Gets or sets the layout mode of the print document. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlPrintRowHeaders
data.value: Gets or sets whether to print headers of the row fields. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlPrintUnusedFilterFields
data.value: Gets or sets whether to print headers of the unused filter fields. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlPrintValueBackground
data.value: Gets or sets the brush used to paint the background of field value cells when the pivot grid is printed. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlPrintValueForeground
data.value: Gets or sets the brush used to paint the foreground of field value cells when the pivot grid is printed. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlPrintValueTotalBackground
data.value: Gets or sets the brush used to paint the background of total and grand total headers when the pivot grid is printed. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlPrintValueTotalForeground
data.value: Gets or sets the brush used to paint the foreground of total and grand total headers when the pivot grid is printed. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlPrintVertLines
data.value: Gets or sets whether the vertical grid lines are printed.This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlResizingIndicatorTemplate
data.value: Gets or sets a template used to display the resizing indicator.

data.name: PivotGridControlRowCount
data.value: Gets the number of rows in the PivotGridControl.

data.name: PivotGridControlRowFieldValuesAlignment
data.value: Gets or sets the vertical alignment of row field values. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlRowTotalsHeightFactor
data.value: Gets or sets the factor used to define how much higher the total rows are, compared to the field value rows. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlRowTotalsLocation
data.value: Gets or sets the location of row totals. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlRowTreeHeight
data.value: Gets or sets the height of a row when row field values are arranged in a tree. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlRowTreeMinHeight
data.value: Gets or sets the minimum allowed height of a row when row field values are arranged in a tree. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlRowTreeMinWidth
data.value: Gets or sets the minimum allowed width of the innermost row field values when they are arranged into a tree.This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlRowTreeOffset
data.value: Gets or sets the tree offset. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlRowTreeWidth
data.value: Gets or sets the width of the innermost row field values when they are arranged into a tree. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlScrollingMode
data.value: Gets or sets the scrolling mode. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlSelection
data.value: Gets or sets the coordinates of the selected cells.

data.name: PivotGridControlSelectMode
data.value: Gets or sets the selection mode.

data.name: PivotGridControlShowBorder
data.value: Gets or sets whether the pivot grid's border is displayed. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlShowColumnGrandTotalHeader
data.value: Gets or sets whether the Grand Total column header is visible when there are two or more data fields. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlShowColumnGrandTotals
data.value: Gets or sets whether Row Grand Totals are displayed.

data.name: PivotGridControlShowColumnHeaders
data.value: Gets or sets whether column headers are displayed.

data.name: PivotGridControlShowColumnTotals
data.value: Gets or sets whether to display Column Totals.

data.name: PivotGridControlShowCustomTotalsForSingleValues
data.value: Gets or sets whether Custom Totals are displayed for the field values which contain a single nesting field value.

data.name: PivotGridControlShowDataHeaders
data.value: Gets or sets whether data headers are displayed.

data.name: PivotGridControlShowFilterHeaders
data.value: Gets or sets whether to display the Filter Header Area.

data.name: PivotGridControlShowGrandTotalsForSingleValues
data.value: Gets or sets whether Grand Totals are displayed when the control lists a single value of an outer column field or row field along its left or top edge.

data.name: PivotGridControlShowPrefilterPanel
data.value: Gets whether the Prefilter Panel is displayed within the PivotGridControl. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlShowPrefilterPanelMode
data.value: Gets or sets when the Prefilter Panel is displayed within the PivotGridControl. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlShowRowGrandTotalHeader
data.value: Gets or sets whether the Grand Total row header is visible when there are two or more data fields. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlShowRowGrandTotals
data.value: Gets or sets whether Row Grand Totals are displayed.

data.name: PivotGridControlShowRowHeaders
data.value: Gets or sets whether row headers are displayed.

data.name: PivotGridControlShowRowTotals
data.value: Gets or sets whether Row Totals are displayed.

data.name: PivotGridControlShowTotalsForSingleValues
data.value: Gets or sets whether automatic totals are displayed for the field values which contain a single nesting field value.

data.name: PivotGridControlSortBySummaryDefaultOrder
data.value: Gets or sets the sort order applied to a field when sorting by summaries is enabled for it.

data.name: PivotGridControlSummaryDataSourceFieldNaming
data.value: Gets or sets the rule for naming columns that correspond to data fields, when creating a data source via the CreateSummaryDataSource methods.

data.name: PivotGridControlUseAsyncMode
data.value: Gets or sets whether data-aware operations caused by end-user actions are performed asynchronously. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlValueBackground
data.value: Gets or sets the brush used to paint the background of field value cells. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlValueForeground
data.value: Gets or sets the brush used to paint the foreground of field value cells. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlValueSelectedBackground
data.value: Gets or sets the brush used to paint the background of the selected field value cell. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlValueSelectedForeground
data.value: Gets or sets the brush used to paint the foreground of the selected field value cell. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlValueTotalBackground
data.value: Gets or sets the brush used to paint the background of total and grand total headers. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlValueTotalForeground
data.value: Gets or sets the brush used to paint the foreground of total and grand total headers. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlValueTotalSelectedBackground
data.value: Gets or sets the brush used to paint the background of the selected total or grand total header. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridControlValueTotalSelectedForeground
data.value: Gets or sets the brush used to paint the foreground of the selected total or grand total header. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridCustomTotalCellFormat
data.value: Gets or sets the string used to format the custom total values.

data.name: PivotGridCustomTotalFormat
data.value: Gets or sets the string used to format the text within the custom total headers.

data.name: PivotGridCustomTotalSummaryType
data.value: Gets or sets the type of the summary function used to calculate the current custom total.

data.name: PivotGridFieldActualCellTemplate
data.value: Gets the template actually used to display the cells of the current field. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldActualCellTemplateSelector
data.value: Gets the actual template selector that chooses a cell template based on custom logic. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldActualHeaderContentStyle
data.value: Gets the style actually applied to the field header. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldActualHeaderListTemplate
data.value: Gets the template actually used to display the field header in the Customization Form when headers are arranged in a list. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldActualHeaderListTemplateSelector
data.value: Gets the actual template selector that chooses a template used to display the field header in the Customization Form when headers are arranged in a list. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldActualHeaderTemplate
data.value: Gets the template actually used to display the header of the current field. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldActualHeaderTemplateSelector
data.value: Gets the actual template selector that chooses a field header template based on custom logic. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldActualHeaderTreeViewTemplate
data.value: Gets the template actually used to display the field header in the Customization Form when headers are arranged in a tree. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldActualHeaderTreeViewTemplateSelector
data.value: Gets the actual template selector that chooses a template, used to display the field header in the Customization Form when headers are arranged in a tree. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldActualPrintCellTemplate
data.value: Gets the template actually used to print the cells of the current field. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldActualPrintCellTemplateSelector
data.value: Gets the actual template selector that chooses a print template for data cells based on custom logic. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldActualPrintHeaderTemplate
data.value: Gets the template actually used to print the header of the current field. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldActualPrintHeaderTemplateSelector
data.value: Gets the actual template selector that chooses a print template for field headers based on custom logic. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldActualPrintValueTemplate
data.value: Gets the template actually used to print the values of the current field. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldActualPrintValueTemplateSelector
data.value: Gets the actual template selector that chooses a print template for field values based on custom logic. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldActualValueTemplate
data.value: Gets the template actually used to display the values of the current field. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldActualValueTemplateSelector
data.value: Gets the actual template selector that chooses a field value template based on custom logic. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldAllowDrag
data.value: Gets or sets whether an end-user is allowed to drag the Field Header. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldAllowDragInCustomizationForm
data.value: Gets or sets whether end-users are allowed to drag field headers between areas in the Customization Form. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldAllowedAreas
data.value: Gets or sets the areas within which the field can be positioned. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldAllowExpand
data.value: Gets or sets whether an end-user is allowed to expand/collapse the rows or columns which correspond to the current field. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldAllowFilter
data.value: Gets or sets whether an end-user can apply a filter to the current field. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldAllowSort
data.value: Gets or sets whether an end-user can modify the field's current sort order. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldAllowSortBySummary
data.value: Gets or sets whether end-users can sort the current row/column field values by other column/row summary values. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldAllowUnboundExpressionEditor
data.value: Gets or sets whether end-users can invoke the Expression Editor for the field. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldArea
data.value: Gets or sets the area in which the field is displayed. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldAreaIndex
data.value: Gets or sets the field's index among the other fields displayed within the same area. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldAutoPopulatedProperties
data.value: Get or set a collection of OLAP member properties.

data.name: PivotGridFieldBestFitArea
data.value: Gets or sets which interface elements are taken into account when calculating optimal width for field columns (or height for rows). This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldBestFitMaxRowCount
data.value: Gets or sets the number of cells taken into account when calculating the optimal width required for a column (or row) to completely display its contents. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldBestFitMode
data.value: Gets or sets how the optimal width required for a column (or row), to completely display its contents is calculated. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldCaption
data.value: Gets or sets the field's display caption. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldCellFormat
data.value: Gets or sets the string used to format the cells. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldCellTemplate
data.value: Gets or sets a template used to display cells that correspond to the current field. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldCellTemplateSelector
data.value: Gets or sets an object that chooses a cell template based on custom logic. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldCollectionItem
data.value: Gets the field with the specified name.

data.name: PivotGridFieldCustomTotals
data.value: Gets the collection of custom totals for the current field.

data.name: PivotGridFieldDataType
data.value: Gets the field's data type.

data.name: PivotGridFieldDisplayText
data.value: Gets the string displayed within the field's header. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldDropDownFilterListSize
data.value: Gets or sets the width and height of the field's filter dropdown. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldEmptyCellText
data.value: Gets the text displayed by an empty cell. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldEmptyValueText
data.value: Gets the text used for an empty field value header. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldExpandedInFieldsGroup
data.value: Gets or sets the expansion status of the current field if it belongs to a field group. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldExpressionFieldName
data.value: Gets the name by which the field is referred to in unbound expressions.

data.name: PivotGridFieldFieldName
data.value: Gets or sets the name of the data source field assigned to the current PivotGridField object. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldFilterValues
data.value: Gets or sets the filter values for the current field.

data.name: PivotGridFieldGrandTotalCellFormat
data.value: Gets or sets the string used to format grand total values. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldGrandTotalText
data.value: Gets or sets the text displayed within the Grand Total's header that corresponds to the current field. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldGroup
data.value: Gets or sets the group which owns the current field. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldGroupIndex
data.value: Gets or sets the index of the field in a field group. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldGroupInterval
data.value: Gets or sets how the values of the current column or row field are combined into groups. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldGroupIntervalNumericRange
data.value: Gets or sets the length of intervals into which field values are grouped. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldHasGroup
data.value: This member supports the internal infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldHeaderContentStyle
data.value: Gets or sets a style applied to the field header. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldHeaderListTemplate
data.value: Gets the template used to display the field header in the Customization Form when headers are arranged in a list. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldHeaderListTemplateSelector
data.value: Gets or sets an object that chooses a template used to display the field header in the Customization Form when headers are arranged in a list. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldHeaderTemplate
data.value: Gets or sets a template used to display the header of the current field. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldHeaderTemplateSelector
data.value: Gets or sets an object that chooses a field header template based on custom logic. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldHeaderTreeViewTemplate
data.value: Gets the template used to display the field header in the Customization Form when headers are arranged in a tree. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldHeaderTreeViewTemplateSelector
data.value: Gets or sets an object that chooses a template used to display the field header in the Customization Form when headers are arranged in a tree. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldHeight
data.value: Gets or sets the height of rows that correspond to the current field. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldHideEmptyVariationItems
data.value: Gets or sets whether the first (empty) column/row that displays variation data for the current data field must be hidden. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldIsFilterButtonVisible
data.value: Gets whether the filter button is displayed within the field's header. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldIsFiltered
data.value: This member supports the internal infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldIsSortButtonVisible
data.value: Gets whether the sort glyph is displayed within the field's header. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldMinHeight
data.value: Gets or sets the minimum allowed height of rows that correspond to the current field. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldMinWidth
data.value: Gets or sets the minimum allowed width of columns that correspond to the current field. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldName
data.value: Gets or sets the field's name.

data.name: PivotGridFieldOlapDrillDownColumnName
data.value: In OLAP mode, gets the name of the corresponding column in the underlying data source, on an OLAP server.

data.name: PivotGridFieldOlapFilterByUniqueName
data.value: Gets or sets whether PivotGridControl should take into account OLAP member values or unique names when filtering data in an OLAP mode. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldOlapFilterUsingWhereClause
data.value: Gets or sets whether to use the WHERE or subselect clause in an MDX query, when filtering against filter fields in OLAP mode.

data.name: PivotGridFieldOlapUseNonEmpty
data.value: Gets or sets whether the <a href=\"http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ms145988.aspx\">NonEmpty function should be used in MDX queries for the current measure. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldPrefilterColumnName
data.value: Gets the name by which the field is referred to in the Prefilter expression.

data.name: PivotGridFieldPrintCellTemplate
data.value: Gets or sets a template used to print cells that correspond to the current field. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldPrintCellTemplateSelector
data.value: Gets or sets a template selector that chooses a print template for data cells based on custom logic. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldPrintHeaderTemplate
data.value: Gets or sets a template used to print the header of the current field. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldPrintHeaderTemplateSelector
data.value: Gets or sets a template selector that chooses a print template for field headers based on custom logic. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldPrintValueTemplate
data.value: Gets or sets a template used to print values of the current field. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldPrintValueTemplateSelector
data.value: Gets or sets a template selector that chooses a print template for field values based on custom logic. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldRunningTotal
data.value: Gets or sets whether Running totals are calculated for values in the Data Area that correspond to the current column or row field. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldShowCustomTotals
data.value: Gets or sets whether Custom Totals that correspond to the current Column Field or Row Field are visible. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldShowGrandTotal
data.value: Gets or sets whether grand totals that correspond to the current data field are visible. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldShowInCustomizationForm
data.value: Gets or sets whether the field's header is displayed within the customization form when the field is hidden. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldShowSummaryTypeName
data.value: Gets or sets whether the summary type is displayed within the data field's header. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldShowTotals
data.value: Gets or sets whether automatic totals that correspond to the current data field are visible. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldShowValues
data.value: Gets or sets whether data cells that correspond to the current data field are visible. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldSortByAttribute
data.value: Gets or sets the OLAP member property name by which the pivot grid's data is sorted.

data.name: PivotGridFieldSortByConditions
data.value: Contains conditions that identify the column or row whose values are sorted.

data.name: PivotGridFieldSortByCustomTotalSummaryType
data.value: Gets or sets the summary type of custom total values by which the current field values are sorted.This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldSortByField
data.value: Gets or sets the field whose summary values define the order in which the field's values are arranged. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldSortByFieldName
data.value: Gets or sets the PivotGridField.FieldName of the field whose summary values define the order in which the field's values are arranged. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldSortBySummaryType
data.value: Gets or sets the summary function type used to calculate the summary values which define the order in which the field's values are arranged. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldSortMode
data.value: Gets or sets how the field's data is sorted, when sorting is applied to it. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldSortOrder
data.value: Gets or sets the field sort order. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldSummaryDisplayType
data.value: Gets or sets how a summary value calculated against the current data field is represented in a cell. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldSummaryType
data.value: Gets or sets the type of the summary function which is calculated against the current data field. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldTopValueCount
data.value: Gets or sets an absolute or relative number of field values to be displayed for the current column or row field. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldTopValueMode
data.value: Gets or sets whether top n values for specified data field are calculated based on all data source records or in the parent category.

data.name: PivotGridFieldTopValueShowOthers
data.value: Gets or sets whether the \"Others\" item is displayed within the PivotGridControl when the Top N Values feature is enabled. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldTopValueType
data.value: Gets or sets how the number of Top Values is determined. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldTotalCellFormat
data.value: Gets or sets the string used to format the total cells. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldTotalsVisibility
data.value: Gets or sets whether totals are displayed for the current field when it is positioned within the Column Header Area or Row Header Area and if so, whether they are automatic or custom. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldTotalValueFormat
data.value: Gets or sets the string used to format the total header. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldUnboundExpression
data.value: Gets or sets an expression used to evaluate values for the current unbound field. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldUnboundExpressionMode
data.value: Gets or sets whether unbound expression for the specified data field is calculated based on the data source records or summary values.

data.name: PivotGridFieldUnboundFieldName
data.value: Gets or sets the name of a column in a summary data source that corresponds to the current unbound field. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldUnboundType
data.value: Gets or sets the data type and binding mode of the field. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldUseNativeFormat
data.value: Gets or sets whether to use the current field's data format when the Pivot Grid Control is exported in XLS format. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldValueFormat
data.value: Gets or sets a string used to format field values. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldValueTemplate
data.value: Gets or sets a template used to display values of the current field. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldValueTemplateSelector
data.value: Gets or sets an object that chooses a field value template based on custom logic. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldVisible
data.value: Gets or sets whether the field is visible. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridFieldWidth
data.value: Gets or sets the width of columns that correspond to the current field. This is a dependency property.

data.name: PivotGridGroupCaption
data.value: Gets or sets the group's caption.

data.name: PivotGridGroupDisplayText
data.value: Gets the display text of the group header.

data.name: PivotGridGroupFilterValues
data.value: Gets the group filter condition.

data.name: PivotGridGroupIsFilterAllowed
data.value: Gets whether the group filter is used to filter data against the group's fields.

data.name: PivotGridGroupWidth
data.value: Gets the total width of headers that correspond to the fields of the group.

data.name: PivotOlapMemberCaption
data.value: Gets the caption of the OLAP member.

data.name: PivotOlapMemberProperties
data.value: Gets the OLAP member properties.

data.name: PivotOlapMemberUniqueName
data.value: Gets the unique name of the OLAP member.

data.name: PivotOlapMemberValue
data.value: Gets the value of the OLAP member.

data.name: PivotSummaryDataRowDataSource
data.value: Gets the parent summary data source.

data.name: SortByConditionField
data.value: Gets or sets the field to which the condition corresponds.This is a dependency property.

data.name: SortByConditionOlapUniqueMemberName
data.value: Gets or sets the unique name of the corresponding OLAP member.This is a dependency property.

data.name: SortByConditionValue
data.value: Gets or sets the field value represented by the condition. This is a dependency property.
